website_summaries.verdict: Extraordinary may just be the right word to describe the Ahnu Montara III eVent. Indeed, this footgear is a standout thanks to its adorable aesthetics, A-grade comfort level, and jaw-dropping lightness. It is just unfortunate that the criticism it received—its baggy interior—might be viewed as a real cause for concern by some. Nevertheless, the Montara III eVent shoe by Ahnu has more than enough qualities to be considered quite the capable hiking companion.
pros: Numerous owners were smitten by the astonishing design of the Ahnu Montara III eVent
This shoe received praises from a number of verified purchasers for being entrancingly comfortable
Many reviewers, including a footgear pundit, felt quite nimble and light in this Ahnu hiker
Its durable construction amazed several wearers
Breaking in this footwear was a quick affair for a couple of users
An expert was very impressed with the Ahnu Montara III eVent hiking shoe’s lateral stability
cons: Less than a handful of testers found the gear’s overall fit a bit too wide
The Montara III eVent’s insufficient arch support disappointed a professional shoe reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Loved these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I tried over 20 pairs of hiking shoes for my Machu Picchu and The Gallapagos trip. These were perfect! I was familiar with this brand (another pair helped me walk all over Italy). These shoes were the perfect combo of function and style. I got them because I was told it was the rainy season where we were going, and I would need something waterproof....but it ended up not raining. The best advice I can give is something I read somewhere.... shoes should feel good the moment you try them on. So glad these guys made the hiking a joy! Can't wait for my next adventure with them!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Best boots
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of this boot, as I wear them hard and they usually last a year or two, and then are great for “garden shoes.” They are waterproof, and offer good support for hiking or walking behind a lawn mower on uneven ground. The sizing has been consistent through time. I will always own a pair of these boots!
customer_reviews.author: life-long learner

customer_reviews.title: good looking sturdy show
customer_reviews.text: i like the rugged build of these shoes. The laces must be double tied tight, otherwise they will continuously come undone. there is not a ton of cushion in the sole, but they are still comfortable all day. they are a bit stiff, but broke in after only a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: kristine

customer_reviews.title: Bought multiple colors
customer_reviews.text: Best fitting shoe with great arch support. If you are looking for soft cushioned shoes these will not work for you but if you need arch support and stability these are the best.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe don’t like the color.
customer_reviews.text: The color, will take it back to Kohl’. It’s the wrong color. I ordered the brown color and black color. I know it’s passed the return date. Due to health issues. I may buy the correct color again but have no use for olive.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Annett

customer_reviews.title: Lacing design prohibits tightening properly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these and tried them on. I was not able to tighten the laces sufficiently because of how the lacing system was designed. If you can't lace them sufficiently, they aren't safe for trail use. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Kim in MD

customer_reviews.title: Not the same Ahnu
customer_reviews.text: I've had 3 pairs of Ahnu Montara hiking shoes. Now that Teva owns them, they don't seem to be the same shoe. The previous Ahnus were comfortable from the time I put them on. This version seems stiffer- not as comfortable overall. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: More green than brown
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Ahnu shoes, and I love them all! Comfortable right out of box, minimal breaking in time. I really like that they are waterproof and clean up easily. I can hike or walk for hours and my feet don't hurt. The color is actually more green than brown but I like the color just fine :)
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th pair of Ahnus. The support keeps my plantar fasciitis at bay. Excellent walking shoes. I have always been able to just slip them on, no break-in needed
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great dog walking and hiking shoes. They are comfortable and provide good support. This is my second pair of this style. I have wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Too stiff for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is too stiff and unforgiving for my needs. I need a more flexible sole for my comfort, so I'll be returning it. Probably just fine for rough hiking conditions, but not for suburban hiking that I do more of.
customer_reviews.author: STL Gal

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is now my second pair of Ahnu hiking shoes. The other pair was good for 5 years. I am not a serious hiker like up steep hills or anything, but I do enjoy having good support and fit. I highly recommend the Ahnu hiking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: candigirl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Hiking Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love the hiking shoe...fits really good...gives support where needed. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth J. Foley

customer_reviews.title: Stiffer and needs more arch support for my feet structure, but it was true to size.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is slightly wider than my Teva hiking boots, and the ankle height is hitting my external ankle bone. I had to put another heel and arch support to elevate my ankle , since it had blistered from trying them while hiking for the first time. Now it is okay. The shoes is also stiffer than my Teva shoes . It is true to size and I am size 6.
customer_reviews.author: Este Galaraga

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I love my Agnu shoes! It’s like they were made for my feet!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy-Jo.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to break in. This is my fourth pair
customer_reviews.text: There is not enough medial support. I wore a new pair on the Camino Santiago and the back broke down. On the other hand, the shoe is extremely comfortable and I did not get any blisters after hiking 500 miles, 34 days in a row.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Cupp

customer_reviews.title: Best sole comfort with the Vibram cushiom
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased Ahun shoes for years!! Love the support they give me for working ad standing on my feet for eight hours
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe! Water proof
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about them but for some reason I have gotten a blister on my big toe? 🤷🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Randy Beight

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof greatness!
customer_reviews.text: Loved that they are water proof! Great rugged gear for the outdoors person! Sometimes the back occasionally gave me blisters but with band aid support over time it went away.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: I love this brand
customer_reviews.text: this brand is absolutely fabulous. Water proof, great for active hiking or casual wear.
customer_reviews.author: nancy mabson

customer_reviews.title: Not like the other Ahnu day hiking shoes I have
customer_reviews.text: The fit seemed odd and after ordering two pairs and sending them back so I know it wasn't just the first pair. I have thoroughly enjoyed other Ahnu day hiking boots (different styles) and felt that they were comfortable from the moment I put my feet into them. But there was something not right about these. Could be that they felt too stiff. Could also be that the lace grommets didn't really allow me to properly tighten my boot. I just wasn't going to take a chance on keeping them and having them hurt my feet on long walks. Too bad. I really like Anhu shoes and Vibram soles.
customer_reviews.author: DIY'R

customer_reviews.title: Not the color depicted in picture in description
customer_reviews.text: The picture associated with the description is a brownish color. The actual color is truly green. The shoe itself is great, just not color I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara E Propst

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable! Light weight hiking shoes should feel great the first time you wear them. Previously tried on a Anhu Montara II; they felt excellent. Unfortunately, these shoes are not the same! I am returning them immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Bettye

customer_reviews.title: fit is really off from all the other ahnu I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: I always wear this size and the fit was too long, heavy, laces wouldn't stay tied, and the color was strange.
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Kelley

product_meta.title: Ahnu Women's W Montara Iii Event Hiking Boot
product_meta.description: Part of the Ahnu by Teva collection, this lightweight, low-top hiking shoe carries you comfortably over terrains of the muddy, rocky and rugged variety. Featuring waterproof nubuck leather, a waterproof-breathable event membrane, a super-gripping Vibram outsole and Ahnu Numentum® hike technology to keep your foot extra stable on challenging trails.
feature_bullets: Waterproof-nubuck upper seals out the elements to keep your feet dry.
eVent Waterproof membrane seals out rain, puddles and other things that splash to keep your feet dry
Dual Density EVA sockliner cushions the foot and puts a spring in your step
Custom Vibram Megagrip Outsole for outstanding traction and durability
-Dual Density EVA Midsole with Numentum technology
